properties.areaDesc: Walsenburg Vicinity/Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity/Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Eastern Las Animas County
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 10 at 4:04AM MST until February 11 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10
inches. the heavier snowfall amounts will occur near the
mountains.

* WHERE...Huerfano and lower elevations of Las Animas counties.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to noon MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON MST TUESDAY
